19#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
20# include <config.h>
21#endif
22
23/* Specification. */
24#include "plural-count.h"
25
26#include "plural-exp.h"
27
28/* Extract the number of plural forms from a header entry. */
29
30unsigned long int
31get_plural_count (const char *header)
32{
33 struct expression *plural;
34 unsigned long int nplurals;
35
36 extract_plural_expression (header, &plural, &nplurals);
37
38 return nplurals;
39}
40
